title: Ability to re-open closed windows and tabs
content: Would it be useful to have an optional feature to allow TB to re-open closed windows and tabs, for example after you accidentally quit the app (as we still have no confirm dialog), or you may just fat-finger-close something... or if the app crashes. Firefox does this mostly well, I wonder if that figure might be implemented here for TB.
creator: forrie1
